Text:
Thanks Ferrelas!  You're the only one upping this to TPB, so please keep up the good work!

... and, I've set my seeding for this torrent to >= 500%.  and contrary to cortez_the_killer, who thinks I'm a twat, my upload speed is set to unlimited, as it always has been.

You are a legend mate!

Karl isn't faking it.  He might be playing it up a bit, but I believe he is really just a simple, basic person with very little desire to understand anything outside of his little world.

He's a classic provincial.  Here in America, they join the tea party when a black man becomes president.  Not because they are prejudiced, but because they just don't understand it.
thank you ferrelas!
